description.en: This course is conducted on an individual basis as reading and discussion sessions with supervisor(s). The seminar discussions will focus on the theoretical and methodological literature that contextualises the particular dissertation area. The analysis encompasses parts of the dissertation.
description.et: Juhendajaseminar toimub individuaaltöö vormis, kus iseseisvale lugemisele järgnevad kohtumised juhendajaga. Seminaril arutatakse loetud teoreetilist ja metoodikaalast kirjandust ning paigutatakse see valmiva doktoritöö konteksti. Analüüsitakse valmivaid doktoritöö osi.

objectives.en: The aim of this course is to support and augment the students' knowledge and skills in their particular thesis research area.
objectives.et: Eesmärgiks on täiendada ja süvendada doktorandi teadmisi tema doktoritööga seotud teemal.

learning_outcomes.en: Students who have completed the course:
1) are well acquainted with theoretical conceptions and developments in their area of research;
learning_outcomes.et: 1) orienteerub oma doktoritööga seotud teoreetilistes suundumustes;

learning_outcomes.en: 2) know and apply relevant research methods, as well as recognise interdisciplinary connections;
learning_outcomes.et: 2) tunneb ja suudab eritleda oma uurimisvaldkonna meetodeid, seostab neid valdkondade üleselt;

learning_outcomes.en: 3) are capable of selecting matching theoretical approaches to concrete problems analysed in their theses;
learning_outcomes.et: 3) oskab valida teoreetiliste seisukohtade asjakohaseid rakendusi sõltuvalt oma doktoritöö vajadustest;

learning_outcomes.en: 4) are capable of identifying transdisciplinary resolutions that may enhance their area of research.
learning_outcomes.et: 4) oskab leida transdistsiplinaarseid lahendusi oma uurimissuuna arendamiseks.

grade_preconditions.et: Supervisor(s) evaluate the progress made in acquiring particular research methods and in working through different materials.
